entry.tran: 把…当偶像崇拜;非常敬慕;宠爱
entry.def: If you idolize someone, you admire them very much.

example.ex: Naomi idolised her father as she was growing up...
example.tran: 慢慢长大的娜奥米把父亲视为偶像。

example.ex: A tall, soft-spoken woman, she is idolized by her young patients.
example.tran: 她个子高挑，说话轻声细语,深受年轻患者的喜爱。

means.word_mean: 1. love unquestioningly and uncritically or to excess; venerate as an idol;
